header.description: Hello friends! You can call me Zydhan. I'm web development enthusiast with 2 year of experiences and currently study to become Bachelor of Informatics Engineering at Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology Surabaya.

dptsi_its.description: I was offered and accepted an internship offer with DPTSI - Directorate that manages Information Technology services in Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology Surabaya.
